scripts.dev: set ENV=local && babel-node makeEnv.js && nodemon --watch src --exec babel-node src/platform.js
scripts.dev-server: set ENV=local && nodemon --watch src/AppServer.js  --watch src/entities --exec babel-node src/server.js
scripts.dev-client: set ENV=local && babel-node makeEnv.js && react-scripts start
scripts.dev-build-client: set ENV=local && babel-node makeEnv.js && babel-node src/platform.js build-client
